titleStmt.title: Prouysion made by the Kynges hyghnes and his counsayll for puttynge aparte thexcessyue fare [and] redusynge the same to such moderacion as folowyngly ensueth ...
Proclamations. 1517
titleStmt.author: England. Sovereign (1509-1547 : Henry VIII)

publicationStmt.publisher: [Imprynted at the com[m]au[n]dement of our soueraygne lorde the knynge and his counsayl by Richarde Pynson],

notesStmt.note: The number of dishes at a meal fixed by rank.
Imprint from colophon; publication date from STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
